title: Darcy's Trial
description: Darcy on trial for murder: how are the mighty fallen!Returning from her tour of the Lakes, Elizabeth is shocked to discover that Darcy has been seriously injured in a duel. Matters go from bad to worse when his opponent dies and Darcy is prosecuted for murder. Although warned to keep her distance, Elizabeth feels honour-bound to investigate on his behalf, and before long she too is in danger ...
author: M.A. Sandiford
